request.uaString: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_2) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/40.0.2214.111 Safari/537.36

resultSet.errorDescription: All images must have an alt attribute. Not supplying an alt attribute will mean that users who cannot see the image will not understand what the image conveys.
resultSet.resultTitle: Provide alt attributes for IMG elements
standards: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.1.1 Non-text Content

resultSet.errorDescription: All images must have an alt attribute. Not supplying an alt attribute will mean that users who cannot see the image will not understand what the image conveys.
resultSet.resultTitle: Provide alt attributes for IMG elements
standards: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.1.1 Non-text Content

resultSet.errorDescription: Link found which contains no text. Because Accessibility APIs use a link's text do determine its accessible name, this link will have no name and will not be announced by assistive technologies.
resultSet.resultTitle: Ensure link text (and alternate text for images, when used as links) describes the destination or purpose of the link.
standards: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context)
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AAA: 2.4.9 Link Purpose (Link Only)
